name: TRELLIX CLOUDVISORY [<%= srczone %> - Failed Check]
description: This rule looks for failed Trellix Cloudvisory checks with low severity.

name: TRELLIX CLOUDVISORY [<%= srczone %> - Errored Check]
description: This rule looks for errored Trellix Cloudvisory checks.

name: TRELLIX CLOUD CONNECT [<%= action %>]
description: Trellix Cloud Connect reported a event with warning/error.
